section.title: Exploring her Surroundings
section.p: Belle learns about the castle and its hidden secrets. She gets her own room after she finds herself in the enchanted castle and is invited to stay by the beast. She finds a beautiful dress in her room to wear to dinner, of which she's been invited by the beast, and falls in love with the castle and its enchanted objects.
